\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 160.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I took around 10 it started to hit me and I did not care anymore so I took 5 more 20 minutes later, well I was drinking a little bit and just chilling when I decided to take my gun out and walk through my surban neighorhood streets screeming and waving it luckily a friend drove by to pick me up.
